The integrated Trade, Logistics and Industrial Hub of Abu Dhabi

Enabling trade and industrial investments by leveraging the Integrated services of KIZAD with Khalifa Port.

Read More

KHALIFA PORT FREE TRADE ZONE

Khalifa Port Free Trade Zone (Khalifa Port FTZ) is a next generation platform for trade, logistics and manufacturing.

Free Zone

KIZAD offers both Free Zone and Domestic Industrial Zone facilities for investors, who can choose their facilities based on their business strategy and requirements.

Whether you are a small start-up or an established large-scale business, KIZAD can offer customised business facilities spread across its Free Zone and Domestic Tariff Areas. Here you will find further information on the benefits and procedures to help you get started and considering the next steps.

FEATURES & BENEFITS OF BUSINESS SET UP

The Free Zone jurisdiction allows 100% foreign ownership in companies, and it is suitable for wholesale distributors, re-exporters, warehousing activities, service providers and manufacturers targeting markets outside the MENA region.

Key Featured Free Zone
Ownership 100% foreign ownership
Tax (Corporate, Income & Sales) 100% tax free
VAT No VAT
Sales in Local Market Through distributors and / or local agents
Ownership 100% foreign ownership
Tax (Corporate, Income & Sales) 100% tax free
VAT No VAT
Sales in Local Market Through distributors and / or local agents
More Features
